intents.response: Scrape.IFY is made with a very simplistic design. You can press on one of these pages and I will guide you to the pages:

options.text: To Learn more about our website press the Home page.
To start webscraping you can click on the webscraper page.
To have one of our professionals create a webscraper for you press the Services or Buy now page.

intents.response: What issues are you facing with the webscraper? Please type one of the following numbers:

options.text: Why am I given an empty file when Im finished with the webscraping.
How do I use the Web-scraper?
Firstly, I need you to provide me with 2 links that we will be scraping the data from!Just insert the two URLs.
Now, input your desire products name for scrape.
Finally Click Generate to your custom web scrape file.
Click the link to generate your custom Web-scraper file.

intents.response: No worries, here is how you can reach human customer support:

options.text: See our marketing website for more details about our project!

intents.response: Here's more information about our website. Navigate to our home page....
Get a custom webscraper created by our professionals....

options.text: If you’re receiving an empty file it could be due to 2 things. Either you’ve made a typo in the name of the product so you’re either getting an empty output file or different product searches.

The more specific you are when typing the product the more precise your web-scraped data will be.   eg: Dior Sauvage Eau De Parfum 100 ml. The product is not available on the 3 websites scraped. In that case there will be no outputs to retrieve.

intents.response: It’s very simple to use the Scrape.ify web-scraper. All you need to do is:

options.text: Type the product name with no typing errors.
Press the Download Excel File Button.
Wait for the web-scraper to do it’s magic and you’ll receive all the retrieved data from our web-scraper in an excel file on your laptop. Type 1 for restart the chat.
